front.title: OSPF Protocol Extensions for Boundary Node Discovery (BND)

abstract.t: There are various circumstances where it is highly desirable to be able to dynamically and automatically discover a set of Boundary Nodes (BN) along with their domain information. For that purpose, this document defines extensions to the Open Shortest Path First (OSPF) routing protocol for the advertisement of Boundary Node (BN) Discovery information within an OSPF area or within the entire OSPF routing domain.
